= Resource Records Supported =

=== Net_DNS2 Supports the following RR's ===

 * A
 * NS
 * CNAME
 * SOA
 * WKS (as of version 1.0.1)
 * PTR
 * HINFO
 * MX
 * TXT
 * RP
 * AFSDB
 * X25
 * ISDN
 * RT
 * NSAP
 * SIG
 * KEY
 * PX
 * AAAA
 * LOC
 * EID      
 * NIMLOC
 * SRV
 * ATMA (as of version 1.1.0)
 * NAPTR
 * KX
 * CERT
 * DNAME
 * OPT
 * APL
 * DS
 * SSHFP
 * IPSECKEY 
 * RRSIG    
 * NSEC
 * DNSKEY
 * DHCID    
 * NSEC3
 * NSEC3PARAM
 * HIP
 * TALINK _(as of version 1.2.0)_
 * CDS _(as of version 1.2.0)_
 * SPF
 * TKEY
 * TSIG
 * URI _(as of version 1.2.0)_
 * CAA _(as of version 1.2.0)_
 * TA _(as of version 1.2.0)_
 * DLV
